hesml.measures.impl

Class MeasureLiuStrategy1

  • java.lang.Object
    • hesml.measures.impl.SimilaritySemanticMeasure
      • hesml.measures.impl.MeasureLiuStrategy1
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISimilarityMeasure

    class MeasureLiuStrategy1
extends SimilaritySemanticMeasure
    This class implements the similarity measures defined in equation (4) of the paper introduced by Liu et al. (2007) cited below: Liu, X. Y., Zhou, Y. M., and Zheng, R. S. (2007). Measuring Semantic Similarity in Wordnet. In Proc. of the 2007 International Conference on Machine Learning and Cybernetics (Vol. 6, pp. 3431â€“3435). IEEE.
    Author:
    j.lastra

    • Field Detail

      • m_Alfa

        private final double m_Alfa
        Tuning parameters defined in equation (4) of the Liu et al. (2007) paper. The authors say that they obtain the highest correlation with alfa = 0.5 and beta = 0.55.

      • m_Beta

        private final double m_Beta

    • Constructor Detail

      • MeasureLiuStrategy1

        MeasureLiuStrategy1(ITaxonomy taxonomy,
                    double alfa,
                    double beta)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        taxonomy - The taxonomy used to compute the measurements.
        alfa - Alfa factor defined in equation (4) of the paper.
        beta - Beta factor defined in equation (4) of the paper.
